程序包 uk.ac.ed.inf

类 MenuUtils

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.MenuUtils
public class MenuUtils
extends java.lang.Object

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类 
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    (专用程序包) class  MenuUtils.Item
    The class stores the name and price of a certain food item.
    (专用程序包) class  MenuUtils.Menu
    The class stores the name, location and menu of store.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    private void buildItem()
    Method to extract items information from the menu list and construct an arraylist of the type of MenuUtils.Item.
    private void buildMenu()
    Method to get the menu JSON and construct by GSON into an arraylist of the type of MenuUtils.Menu.

    Method to calculate the total cost by go over the item list.

    Method to search the location of the store provide the input item.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MenuUtils

      public MenuUtils​(java.lang.String port)
      Constructor of MenuUtils class. In the constructor method, function get all the man's and stored in the local.
      参数:
      port - the communication web port to the server

  • 方法详细资料

    • buildMenu

      private void buildMenu()
      Method to get the menu JSON and construct by GSON into an arraylist of the type of MenuUtils.Menu.

    • buildItem

      private void buildItem()
      Method to extract items information from the menu list and construct an arraylist of the type of MenuUtils.Item.

    • getDeliveryCost

      public int getDeliveryCost​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> itemList)
      Method to calculate the total cost by go over the item list.
      参数:
      itemList - the names of the items in the order
      返回:
      the total cost of the price include standard delivery charge

    • getLocation

      public java.lang.String getLocation​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Method to search the location of the store provide the input item.
      参数:
      itemName - the name of the items to search
      返回:
      the WhatThreeWords location of the store provide the item
